item.title: Teva CEO on Tariffs, Generic Drugs Market, MFN Pricing
item.description: Teva Pharmaceutical CEO Richard Francis discusses potential tariff pressures, generic drugs market and Most Favored Nation drug pricing. He speaks with Scarlet Fu and Katie Greifeld on “Bloomberg Mark
